茅以升.definition: Mao Yisheng (1896-1989), Chinese structural engineer and social activist

茅坑裡點燈.definition: (slang) (fig.) to court death (derived from 找死[zhao3 si3] via its near homophone 照屎[zhao4 shi3])

茅塞頓開.definition: murky darkness suddenly opens (idiom); a sudden flash of insight and all is clear

茅山.definition: Mt Mao, Daoist mountain southeast of Jurong county 句容[Ju4 rong2], Jiangsu Province

茅房.definition: toilet (rural euphemism); thatched hut or house

茅盾文學獎.definition: Mao Dun Literature Prize, PRC prize for novel writing, awarded since 1982

茅箭.definition: Maojian district of Shiyan city 十堰市[Shi2 yan4 shi4], Hubei

茅箭區.definition: Maojian district of Shiyan city 十堰市[Shi2 yan4 shi4], Hubei

茅臺.definition: maotai liquor 茅臺酒|茅台酒[mao2 tai2 jiu3]

茅臺酒.definition: maotai (a strong spirit produced in Guizhou); CL:杯[bei1],瓶[ping2]
